----

Extensions for using `inline-snapshot <https://github.com/15r10nk/inline-snapshot>`__ to test `Django <https://www.djangoproject.com/>`__ projects.

Documentation
-------------

Please see https://inline-snapshot-django.readthedocs.io/.
